name: languagesource
short_description: Language Source Ltd is the UK's and Europe's number 1 IT language reseller which offers Adobe Design Premium CS6 Middle East, Standard CS5.5, Illustrator CS7 ME, Acrobat Microsoft Office 2010 Professional DSP 2011 Home & Business MAC and Windows 7 language packs in Arabic, English UK, US, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Hebrew, Farsi, Korean Dutch, Danish, Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish, multilingual word processing, HP bilingual keyboards and keyboard stickers, transparent laptop overlayslanguageSource.com is based in the United Kingdom but ships to any destination over the world we have offices in North America and Asia. Contact us for a free quote.
